about_the_game:
Fantasy Online was an MMORPG that existed from 2009 until its shutdown in Jan 2014.

This game is a complete Remake of the original with identical locations, features, and gameplay. As the development progresses, more of my own features will be added.

It is also currently playable on the Website! A full downloadable client release will be available soon!

For those that never played Fantasy Online, It is a "Free online WebGL-based MMORPG" that brings you back to the good old days of RPGs.

Fight over 160 unique enemies!
Grow stronger with 30 unique skills!
Collect over 600 unique Items!
Explore exciting and nostalgic areas!

Hidden Reef, Crablantis, Underground Market, Temple of Lost Souls, Swamp Grotto, Holiday Isles, Dark Marsh, New Crab Coast, Cave of Dispair, Forgotten Wasteland, Frozen North, Cave of Some Return, Crab Coast, Mirabella Cove, Forgotten Underground, Mirky Woods, Halloween Isles, Noob Island, Pirate Island, Forgotten UnderUnderground, Haunted Forest

More areas to come!!

Kill enemies to collect gold, experience, and more powerful items.

At level 60, you can rebirth and start your adventure anew at level 1. Unlocking better stats, new areas, more equipment, and more!

Planned features are Guilds, Crafting, Leaderboards, Player Market, and more!

name: Fantasy Online - Remake
short_description: Fantasy Online Remake is a free-to-play cross-platform Fantasy MMORPG. Fight monsters, collect items, explore areas, chat with friends, and relive your favorite childhood MMO.
